name: Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Wash
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India. Himalaya's Purifying Neem Facewash is a soap-free formulation that cleans impurities and helps clear pimples. A natural blend of Neem and Turmeric are known for their antimicrobial properties, to help combat and prevent the recurrence of pimples over time.
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India.

name: Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel
description:
Brand: Parachute SkinPure    Product Benefits: Makes Skin Glowy, Hydrated & Soft    Item Form: Gel    Material Type Free: Paraben Free     Skin Type: All Skin Types    Liquid Volume: 100 ML    Special Feature: Soothes Sunburn • Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel: Enriched with 99% Aloe Vera, Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel offers comprehensive care for your face and skin. This gentle yet potent formula is designed to heal, repair, and protect your skin, providing essential nourishment for a healthy and radiant complexion.    • Healing and Repairing Properties: With its high concentration of Aloe Vera, this gel is highly effective in healing and repairing damaged skin. Aloe Vera is renowned for its soothing and anti-inflammatory properties, which help to calm irritation, reduce redness.     • Moisturizing Benefits: Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel keeps the skin moisturized, providing long-lasting hydration to prevent dryness and flakiness. Regular use of this gel helps to maintain the skin's natural moisture balance, leaving it soft, smooth, and supple.    • Goodness of Niacinamide: Niacinamide helps with spots & mark reduction providing naturally glowing skin • Soothing Sunburn Relief: Parachute SkinPure Aloe Vera Gel offers soothing relief for sunburned skin. Its cooling and anti-inflammatory properties help to alleviate discomfort, reduce redness, and promote healing after sun exposure. Applying this gel to sunburned areas provides instant relief, helping to calm irritation and restore the skin's natural balance.    • Versatile Application: This Aloe Vera gel can be applied directly onto the face as a moisturizer or used as a face mask for an extra boost of hydration and nourishment. Its lightweight and non-greasy formula make it suitable for daily use, providing instant relief and comfort to tired and stressed skin. It can also be used as a hair mask.

description:

name: Pond's Face Wash Bright Beauty
description:
Is your true complexion lost or hidden? Over time dead skin cells accumulate on your skin, hiding your true complexion, and making you look dull and dark. New and improved Pond's White Beauty Face Wash. 1st ever facewash with Double Brightening Action to renew your complexion every day. Now get the clinically proven benefits with Pond's. Your complexion is hidden under layers of dead skin cells and pollution. Pond’s White Beauty Face Wash with advanced vitamin B3+ formula will cleanse your skin and give you a spotless glow. It goes deep to clean dead skin cells and uncovers millions of new cells- so that you can get your hidden complexion back. Infused with vitamin B3+, it removes layers of dead skin cells and strengthens the skin's natural renewal process, revealing new bright cells. Renew your complexion with everyday wash. Clinically proven to give you a glow from the first wash. Its double brightness action wipes out dead skin cells so that you can say goodbye to skin dullness. This helps bring out the complexion locked inside which shows clearly after every use of Pond's White Beauty Facewash. This is truly your solution to spotless and glowing skin.

name: Pond's Face Wash Daily
description:
New Pond's Daily Face Wash is designed to give your skin a fresh feel every day. This face wash is designed for all skin types. Active cleansing system cleanses thoroughly & gently. Cares for your skin as it cleans more gently than a soap can. Menthol & Peppermint fusion helps to leave your skin fresh and renewed. This Ultra-mild face wash is perfect for everyday exfoliation. Get fresh skin every day with the new Pond's Daily Face Wash.

description:

name: Simple Micellar Facial Wash
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India. Experience gentle and effective cleansing with Simple Micellar Facial Wash, a 150 ml bottle of skincare goodness designed to remove impurities, makeup, and excess oil while keeping your skin hydrated and refreshed. Simple, a brand known for its commitment to sensitive skin, presents this micellar facial wash that harnesses the power of micellar cleansing technology to leave your skin feeling clean, clear, and revitalized.

description:

This 200 ml bottle of gel wash is meticulously formulated to remove impurities, excess oil, and makeup residue, leaving your skin feeling clean, revitalized, and ready to breathe.

name: Himalaya Fresh Start Oil Clear Face Wash Lemon
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from India. Manufacturer: The Himalaya Drugs Ltd. Himalaya's Fresh Start Oil Clear Lemon Face Wash is a special formulation with the burst of citrusy Lemon and the deep cleansing action of natural beads that helps remove excess oil, dirt, and impurities. Lemon  Widely used in cosmetics for its great skin-conditioning properties, Lemon has refreshing and astringent properties that help reduce excess facial oiliness. Indian Gooseberry The astringent properties in Indian Gooseberry help reduce excess skin oiliness.
